project_descr: The project will assist Yemen in the preparation of its First Biennial Update Report  and Third National Communication for the implementation of the obligations under the United Nation Framework Convention for Climate Change.

outputs.output_descr: The project will assist Yemen in the preparation of its First Biennial Update Report (BUR) and Third National Communication (TNC) for the implementation of the obligations under the United Nations Framework Convention for Climate Change (UNFCCC).

document_name: Third National Communication and First Biennial Update
